title: Laplink DiskImage Professional 10.0 Build 71 + RegKey [SadeemPC]
description:
Laplink DiskImage Professional 10.0 build 71 (x32/x64) | 46 MB / 52 MB

Protect your PC with a perfect copy (image) of all your applications, files and settings. Quickly and easily restore your PC and recover damaged or lost files due to corrupted systems, viruses, hackers or other malware. DiskImage even restores to a PC with different hardware using the Hardware Independent Restore feature. You aren't just protecting data; you're securing your entire PC. When you restore an image, the old PC's setup is restored along with the data, whether it is onto the same PC or onto another one. DiskImage is the perfect solution to protect against unforeseen data loss.	

- Protect your pc with a perfect copy (image) of all your applications, files and settings
- Recover damaged or lost files due to corrupted systems, viruses, hackers or other malware
- Easily repair and restore your Windows system, applications and files directly from the boot CD, even if your operating system won't start
- Create images and perform restorations with the easy-to-use one click wizard
- Restore your entire image to any PC regardless of hardware
- Restore an image (or actual hard drive contents) to a new PC without overwriting your operating system. Includes full selectivity, undo option and more
- Store your image on CDs, DVDs, Blu-ray Discs or external media
- Automatically create full or incremental images of your pc, even while in use.

Hardware Independent
Restore your entire image to any PC regardless of hardware.

Advanced Burning
Store your image on CDs, DVDs, Blu-ray DiscsÂ® or any other external media!

Automated Imaging
Use the built-in scheduler to automatically create full or incremental images of your PC, even while it's in use.

Boot CD
Easily repair and restore your Windows system, applications and files directly from the boot CD*, even if your operating system wonâ€™t start.

System Requirements: Windows 10 | 8.1 | 8 | 7 | Vista
